["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","blockquote",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Alpine Linux is a security-oriented, lightweight Linux distribution based on musl libc and busybox."}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Alpine Linux 是一个面向安全，轻量级的基于 musl libc 与 busybox 项目的 Linux 发行版。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在终端输入以下命令以替换镜像源："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"sed -i 's#https\?://dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/alpine#{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}#g' /etc/apk/repositories","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["也可以直接编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apk/repositories"}]," 文件。以下是 v3.5 版本的参考配置："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/v3.5/main
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/v3.5/community"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["也可以使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"latest-stable"}]," 指向最新的稳定版本："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/latest-stable/main
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/latest-stable/community"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["更改完 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apk/repositories"}]," 文件后请运行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"apk update"}]," 更新索引以生效。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Alpine 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
